posts.message:
Are there any java developers who wrote applications that deals with SQL Server database ?

is it normal that update operations take too much time ? Are there any suggestion , tips , recommended way to connect java code to sql server to do some insertion and update operations. Thanks in advance.

SENIOR .NET DEVELOPER

Location: Mohandessien, Egypt.

Job type: Full time

Qualifications:

 3+ years of experience at the same position.
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering.
 Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.
 Understanding the full software life-cycle
 Excellent knowledge of using C#, WPF.
 Excellent knowledge of using C, C++
 Excellent knowledge of MS SQL Server (2000, 2005 or 2008) and databases concepts.
 Strong background in OOP.
 Familiarity with Visual Studio 2008, 2010 and 2013.
 Excellent knowledge of .Net 3.5/4.0.
 Knowledge of the WCF and Web Services;
 Basic understanding of XML is a plus.
 Java is a plus.
 Silverlight developing is a plus.
 MCTS, MCPD is a plus.
 An active desire to learn new skills, ability to ask the right questions.
 Ability to work in team.
 Ability to understand the existing code base.
 Ability to suggest and make changes or improvements.

Apply at:
Joboffers777@hotmail.com
Please write (DOT NET) at the email subject’s line.

#DEVELOPER #IT_Jobs #FCI #ITI #DOT_NET #DEVELOPERS #JOBS #JOBS_IN_EGYPT #EGYPT_IT_JOBS #JAVA #WAZAYEF #COMPUTER_SCIENCE #APPS #JOBS #VACANCY #VACANCIES #RECRUITMENT #WORK
Please #Spread the #Word
